__e: I'm glad you became a priest, clung to God, because, in the end, he is the only salvation.
You got it easier than me, kid, but it all comes down to the same thing.
It is, after all, what we are.
When we finally escaped up the rope, I remember you picked me up, and you just held me really tight.
Nice to know you're finally referring to her as the victim.
Even if I tell Paul not to come, he'll show up here eventually.
It all comes back to, like, bad choices... who you have as your friends.
But all in all, this has been a good week for me.
In the end, it is I who came to you.
